name: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Solar Park
Xlinks (Marocco UK)
use case: 7000MW solar farm support ** 3500MW wind farm support ** remote generation for UK (3800km  HVDC cable)
notes: 2021: this is early stage and not guaranteed to happened, but putting it there as it is a very ambitious project and more of those are needed ** construction to start in 2025, the first systems to go onine in 2027 ** PPA at 48 GBP / Mwh ** the youtube video is a great overview
